instructions:
Combine Hellmann's(R) or Best Foods(R) Real Mayonnaise, relish, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce and onion with wire whisk in medium bowl. Season, if desired, with salt and pepper.
Pulse ham in food processor a few times until coarsely ground. Fold ham into mayonnaise mixture. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
Arrange lettuce on bottom halves of biscuits, then top with ham salad and biscuit tops.
title: Ham Salad on Biscuits
ingredients: 1/2 cup Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
6 (1/4 inch thick) slices cooked ham, cut into cubes
